title: Bug 4974 - Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When pressing OK after setting the output location and classpath in the project settings, the error message 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src' is displayed. This occurs because setting the output location and classpath are currently two separate operations, and setting the output location first creates an illegal state.
SR:
1. Open the project settings.
2. Go to the 'Output Location' tab.
3. Set the desired output location.
4. Go to the 'Classpath' tab.
5. Set the desired classpath.
6. Press OK.
